action.primary: Calms the Spirit and relieves constraint

indications: Constrained emotions with bad temper, depression, insomnia, irritability, and poor memory

action.primary: Invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, stops pain and reconnects sinews and bones
Regulates Qi, alleviates pain, dissipates swellings and reduces abscesses

indications: Pain and swelling of abscesses (internally and externally)

contraindications: Contraindicated if there are no symptoms of Qi and Blood Stagnation

useCases: Insomnia secondary to Qi Stagnation with Yin Deficiency.
With wine for trauma induced swelling and pain.
Lung abscess with chest pain and coughing of sputum and Blood.
Swelling and pain due to trauma.

Nourishes Heart Blood to Calm the Spirit, and invigorates the Blood, reconnects sinews and bones, reduces swelling and expels Wind from the collaterals to restore nourishment to the tissues of the exterior.

notes: It nourishes the Heart and Spleen, generates flesh and has a marked Yin tonic effect.
It focuses the mind and makes people happy.
Long term use lightens the body, brightens the eyes and allows people to achieve their goals.
It promotes family affection and harmony.
It has a moderate effect and requires large doses over time.

Both He Huan Pi and the flower, Flos Albizziae #{HeHuanHua} He Huan Hua, are sweet and neutral, augment the Heart and Spleen, remove constraint and calm the Spirit. He Huan Pi has a slightly greater ability to invigorate the Blood, stop pain and reduce swellings, while He Huan Hua moves Liver Qi, and is better for soothing the Liver, unbinding the Stomach, promoting memory, promoting sleep and brightening the eyes.
It is used primarily for insomnia, irritability and poor memory especially when accompanied by epigastric pain and pressure in the chest.

Both He Huan Pi and Caul. Polygoni Multiflori #{YeJiaoTeng} Ye Jiao Teng calm the Spirit. He Huan Pi soothes the Heart and Spleen Qi , invigorates the Blood, stops pain and reconnects sinews and bones. Ye Jiao Teng nourishes the Heart and Liver Blood and expels Wind in the collaterals to stop itch and treat skin disorders.
